fullText: What 'Motown The Musical' lacks in dramatic sophistication, it makes up for with an exuberant celebration of the Motown sound that defined an era.
dtliExcerpt: What 'Motown The Musical' lacks in dramatic sophistication, it makes up for with an exuberant celebration of the Motown sound that defined an era.
